hero.title: Leadseeder: The Ultimate LinkedIn Automation Tool
hero.description: 10x your LinkedIn outreach and book more meetings with Leadseeder. Automate connection requests, follow-up messages, and profile visits. Start your 7-day free trial today!

services.title: Key Features
services.description: Leadseeder helps you automate your LinkedIn outreach and generate more leads with ease.

items.title: Automated Connection Requests
items.description: Send personalized connection requests to your target audience on LinkedIn, expanding your network effortlessly.

items.title: Automated Follow-Up Messages
items.description: Engage with your connections by sending automated follow-up messages, nurturing leads and driving conversions.

items.title: Profile Visit Automation
items.description: Automatically visit profiles of your prospects, increasing your visibility and attracting attention from potential leads.

projects.title: Success Stories
projects.description: See how Leadseeder is helping businesses generate more leads and grow their network on LinkedIn.

items.title: Increased Lead Generation for Sales Team
items.description: Leadseeder helped a sales team increase their lead generation by 3x in just one month.

mainFeatures.title: Cloud-Based Automation
mainFeatures.description: Run your LinkedIn automation 24/7 without needing your computer on. Leadseeder operates entirely in the cloud.

mainFeatures.title: Campaign Performance Analytics
mainFeatures.description: Track detailed campaign metrics, including profile views, invitations sent, and message engagement.

mainFeatures.title: Custom Outreach Flows
mainFeatures.description: Create personalized LinkedIn outreach flows with actions like profile visits, connection requests, and messages.

features.title: More Powerful Features
features.description: Unlock the full potential of LinkedIn with Leadseeder's advanced features.

items.title: Smart Reply Detection
items.description: Automatically remove prospects from campaigns when they reply to your messages.

items.title: Daily Activity Limiter
items.description: Take control of your LinkedIn activity with daily action limits to stay within safe boundaries.

cta.title: Ready to Supercharge Your LinkedIn?
cta.description: Start your free trial and experience the power of Leadseeder today!

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Everything you need to know about Leadseeder.

questions.question: Is Leadseeder safe to use with my LinkedIn account?
questions.answer: Yes, Leadseeder is designed with safety in mind. We provide activity controls and limiters to ensure your account stays within LinkedIn's guidelines.

questions.question: Do I need any technical skills to use Leadseeder?
questions.answer: No, Leadseeder is designed to be user-friendly. You don't need any technical expertise to get started.

questions.question: Can I import prospects from LinkedIn Sales Navigator?
questions.answer: Yes, Leadseeder supports importing prospects from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and LinkedIn Recruiter.

questions.question: How many LinkedIn accounts can I manage with Leadseeder?
questions.answer: You can manage multiple LinkedIn accounts with Leadseeder, making it ideal for teams.

questions.question: What happens if a prospect replies to my message?
questions.answer: Leadseeder's smart reply detection automatically removes prospects from the campaign when they reply, preventing further automated messages.

gallery.description: See how Leadseeder simplifies LinkedIn automation.
